pullRequest.title: feat: Moving visualization rows from columns into filters [DHIS2-9106]
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds a new Flyway script to move columns of type 'YEAR_OVER_YEAR_COLUMN' or 'YEAR_OVER_YEAR_LINE' and "dimension" 'dx' into filters.
Using a Java migration for this case. As recommended, we will let Hibernate deal with the sort_order column.
The reservation Pr for this Flyway is: dhis2/wow-backend#38
